name: Ban and unban user in community - linked device @android @medium-risk @3-devices
description:
Verifies that a community admin can ban a user. 
    The banned user cannot send a message.
    The banned account is restored on a second device. 
    Admin then unbans the user, and they can send messages on both devices.
descriptionHtml:
Verifies that a community admin can ban a user.
The banned user cannot send a message.
The banned account is restored on a second device.
Admin then unbans the user, and they can send messages on both devices.

steps.name: Restore admin account, create new account to be banned
Bob sends a message to community
Verify Bob cannot send messages to community
Admin unbans Bob, Bob can send a third message from both devices
